parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: WorkflowType
nested_items.description: The type of workflow. The only supported value is APPFLOW_INTEGRATION.

nested_items.name: ErrorDescription
nested_items.description: Workflow error messages during execution (if any).

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp that represents when workflow execution started.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp that represents when workflow execution last updated.

nested_items.name: AppflowIntegration
nested_items.description: Workflow attributes specific to APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: SourceConnectorType
nested_items.description: Specifies the source connector type, such as Salesforce, ServiceNow, and Marketo. Indicates source of ingestion.

nested_items.name: ConnectorProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the AppFlow connector profile used for ingestion.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. Customer Profiles assumes this role to create resources on your behalf as part of workflow execution.

nested_items.name: AppflowIntegration
nested_items.description: Workflow execution metrics for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: RecordsProcessed
nested_items.description: Number of records processed in APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: StepsCompleted
nested_items.description: Total steps completed in APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.
